product_name: Vedaka Tea Gold Pouch, 1 kg: Amazon.in: Grocery & Gourmet Foods

reviews.review_body: Usually I purchased Tata Gold tea from Amazon only.I saw one new product from Amazon vedaka tea.ordered 1 kg immly. Because I read all manufacturing details from the label. Good company. Really Amazing taste. Thanks Amazon. In future I never buy tat tea.
Extremely happy with the product, very refreshing falvor . In fact the whole family loved it.

The tea is very good and the aroma which the tea has is also nice. The expectation was very high when I ordered it and it was a great experience for me. I think it can easily beat the Tata and Red Label brands. The tea tastes very awesome and you will love it from the very first sip of the tea. I cannot expect anything better at this price and the discounts and offers provided are also good. It is a value for money product for me.

I do not like leaving unsupportive reviews but people are investing their money in this so:We are 'Society' lovers but I wanted to try something new for a change.So I chose Vedaka AND I also chose to pick the tea our famous Indian tea stall people use. (They usually use local tea dust)This one is very expensive for the bland taste it offers. You have to add larger quantity to get a SLIGHT strong flavour. And I wasn't surprised to learn that the LOCAL TEA DUST was much full of flavour and way cheaper.We kinda mix that dust with Society now just to bring change in strong flavours and experiment a bit. The dust didn't disappoint.A big no for this one.

reviews.review_title: Don't Believe in ratings and reviews
reviews.review_body: i bought it by seeing ratings and reviews but didn't found good...it has bad taste and aroma like a polished tea

reviews.review_title: Recommend to all the assam tea lovers!!!!
reviews.review_body: I HV used tata tea gold for past few years.but after reading the reviews I ordered this tea of 1 kg .I am totally satisfied with the flavor and Color after making tea.It's really needs a small quantity to make liquor.
believe me this is really blind review.i had ordered this and some other brand tea. today i told my wife tea is quite good and she told me it is the vedica Amazon brand. it is reasonably strong.
